price: Nokorε sε, Yεbͻͻ onipa fri nεteε a awoͻ a εnee wͻ mu a efri atεkyε a yanwene mu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
